featured.text: From the 10th through the 13th centuries, forks were fairly common among the wealthy in Byzantium.

definition.zh_def: 拜占庭，古代城市，位於現今土耳其伊斯坦堡，是東羅馬帝國的首都。
definition.en_def: Byzantium, an ancient city located in present-day Istanbul, Turkey, which was the capital of the Eastern Roman Empire.
definition.example: Byzantium was known for its rich culture and strategic location.
